item.description:
I know this is last minute, but if anyone wants to join me for 9 or 18 holes on Sunday (tomorrow)- I'm thinking of getting in one more round before the season ends. Should be a high around 50 tomorrow and sunny, pretty much the best you can expect playing so close to Thanksgiving.

 

I played at Billerica two weeks ago, and the course was still in good shape. There has been some frost between then and now. Tee-time set for 10:46 

Billerica Country Club is about 15 minutes off I-95 in Billerica:

 

http://www.countryclubofbillerica.com/

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Golf at Billerica Country Club
